name: bob-performance
description: Bob Performance Report Automation - Downloads performance cycle reports from HiBob and uploads to Google Sheets

scripts.push: npm run clasp:push && npm run git:push
scripts.git:push: git add -A && git commit -m 'Auto-update: $(date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S)' && git push || true
scripts.quick-push: clasp push && git add -A && git commit -m 'Quick update' && git push || true
